name: Digital Museum Alpha - Android
description:
Honours Project Alpha build of digital museum application based on the ARCO framework. 

A feedback form for this application can be found here - https://forms.gle/1WwnpZxeXGv68mXFA

Your data and feedback will be stored in an encrypted file and used anonymously in my dissertation. Accessing the answers to this questionnaire is only possible only after providing a correct email address and password. The dissertation itself will be presented to academic staff.
All participants need to be over 18 years old.

You can stop the test at any time or contact me via email at sraffe201@caledonian.ac.uk
